sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"粘着，附着"之意。
means: stick ： 常指用胶水或浆糊粘贴，词义引申指坚持。
glue与stick的本义相同，指用胶水把东西粘合在一起，没有"坚持"的含义。
adhere ： 正式用词，语气较严肃刻板，既可指物体粘在一起，也可指坚持信仰或忠于事业等。
cling ： 着重靠缠绕、紧抱、紧抓等方式而形成密切关系。也可作引申用。
cohere ： 指物质微粒粘合在一起，成为不可分离的整体，强调所形成新物体的不可分割性。可引申指逻辑上的前后一致。

sentence.Network_en: The various elements of the novel fail to cohere.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部小说的各部分之间缺乏连贯性。

sentence.Network_en: The empire could not cohere as a legitimate whole.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个帝国无法凝聚成一个合法的整体。

sentence.Network_en: This view does not cohere with their other beliefs.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个观点与他们的其他看法不一致。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 粘字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 粘胶〖 viscose〗 粘结〖 cohere〗 粘聚〖 compact〗.
coexist 共存cohere 附着，粘着coincide 一致，符合，巧合（co- + in 进 + cide 掉下来).
cohere(粘着) coherence(一致) coherent(一致的) cohesion(凝聚力) cohesive(凝聚性的)  inhere(固有) inherence(固有) inherent(固有的) inhesion(固有)  -.
拼字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 拼法〖 spelling〗 拼合〖 cohere〗 拼花地板〖 floorwithdesigns〗.

list.abs: 2008-10-18 -- 工业控制英语词汇大全 ... Coherence 相干性 Coherence length 相干长度（谐波列长度） Coil size 线圈大小.
石油英语词汇(C4) ... coherence filtering 相干滤波 coherence function 相干函数 coherence stack 相干叠加.
电子工程专业词汇C ... coercivity 矫顽性 coherent oscillator 相干振荡器 coil 线圈.
...或瑞利散射,Rayleigh scattering,或相干散射,coherent scattering,由于内层电子的数目随散射物原子序数的增加而增加,外层电子所占比例降低,所以波长不变的散射光子强度随.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin cohaerere, from co- 'together' + haerere 'to stick'

entry.def: If the different elements of a piece of writing, a piece of music, or a set of ideas cohere, they fit together well so that they form a united whole.

example.ex: The various elements of the novel fail to cohere...
example.tran: 这部小说的各部分之间缺乏连贯性。

example.ex: This coheres with Peel's championing of alternative music...
example.tran: 这与皮尔倡导另类音乐的做法一致。

means.word_mean: 1. come or be in close contact with; stick or hold together and resist separation;
2. cause to form a united, orderly, and aethestically consistent whole;
3. have internal elements or parts logically connected so that aesthetic consistency results;

auth_sentence.content: Each new piece of evidence appeared to cohere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each new piece of evidence appeared to cohere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each new piece of evidence appeared to cohere.

auth_sentence.content: Motive tends to provide coherence, and fiction needs things that cohere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Motive tends to provide coherence, and fiction needs things that cohere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Motive tends to provide coherence, and fiction needs things that cohere.

auth_sentence.content: These attributes, as we limitedly perceive them, cohere and de-cohere depending on their relation to each other.
auth_sentence.res_content: These attributes, as we limitedly perceive them, cohere and de-cohere depending on their relation to each other.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These attributes, as we limitedly perceive them, cohere and de-cohere depending on their relation to each other.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一致的,协调的;[话语等]条理清楚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cohere[v.附着;粘着]+ent……的→coherent粘在一起的;一致的,协调的
co共同+hes粘附+ion表名词→cohere的名词

sentences.en: When you squeeze a handful of snow, the flakes cohere to make a snowball.
sentences.cn: 你把一团雪捏紧,雪就黏合成雪球。
